languages.text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса освещается улыбкой.{/n} "С большим удовольствием, {name}. После тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса освещается улыбкой.{/n} "С большим удовольствием, {name}. После тебя".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se ilumina con una sonrisa.{/n} «Eso me gustaría mucho, {name}. Después de ti».
languages.original_text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se ilumina con una sonrisa.{/n} «Eso me gustaría mucho, {name}. Después de ti».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は笑顔を見せた。{/n}「喜んで、{name}。お先にどうぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は笑顔を見せた。{/n}「喜んで、{name}。お先にどうぞ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“我很乐意来一局，{name}。你先请吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“我很乐意来一局，{name}。你先请吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire éclaire son visage.{/n} « Avec plaisir, {name}. Après vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire éclaire son visage.{/n} « Avec plaisir, {name}. Après vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Lächeln lässt sein Gesicht erstrahlen.{/n} "Das würde mir gefallen, {name}. Nach Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}A smile lights up his face.{/n} "I would very much like that, {name}. After you."
